mapper.select:
SELECT `sys_task`.`id` as taskId, `sys_task`.`task_name`, `sys_task`.`task_group`, `sys_task`.`note`, `sys_task`.`task_class`, `sys_task`.`exec_params`, `sys_task`.`cron`, from_unixtime( `qrtz_triggers`.`prev_fire_time` / 1000, '%Y-%m-%d %T' ) as prevFireTime, from_unixtime( `qrtz_triggers`.`next_fire_time` / 1000, '%Y-%m-%d %T' ) as nextFireTime,
`sys_task`.`exec_result`, `sys_task`.`concurrent`, `qrtz_cron_triggers`.`time_zone_id`, `qrtz_triggers`.`trigger_state` FROM `sys_task`, `qrtz_triggers`, `qrtz_cron_triggers` WHERE `qrtz_cron_triggers`.`trigger_group` = `qrtz_triggers`.`trigger_group` AND `qrtz_cron_triggers`.`trigger_name` = `qrtz_triggers`.`trigger_name` AND `qrtz_triggers`.`job_name` = `sys_task`.`task_name` AND `qrtz_triggers`.`job_group` = `sys_task`.`task_group`
